attributes.action: Find a way for Scotland, Northern Ireland, Gibraltar, and London to remain in EU
attributes.additional_details:
Scotland: 62% remain, 38% leave.
Northern Ireland: 55.8% remain, 44.2% leave.
Gibraltar: 95.9% remain, 4.1% leave
London: 59.9% remain, 40.1% leave
attributes.background: Every constituency in Scotland voted to remain, Northern Ireland voted 55.8% remain, Gibraltar voted 95.9% remain, and London voted 59.9% remain. Why should these areas be forced to leave with England and Wales? We ask the government to find a way for these areas to remain in the EU
